# The `ScalarizationResult` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Helper class to indicate whether a vector index can be safely scalarized and if a freeze needs to be inserted. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Helper class to indicate whether a vector index can be safely scalarized and if a freeze needs to be inserted.
